resources.string:
Shake on it is a fun and easy way to keep track of casual bets with your friends.


Simply click "Place a bet", enter the participants' names and the stake (be it money, possessions or forfeits) and then elect a commissioner to hold the stake(s) in escrow.


Once the bet is settled, the commissioner will select the winner(s) and distribute the winnings.


www.whenthefunstops.co.uk
